internal_error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
validation_failed: Invalid input. Please check the fields and try again.
invalid_request: Invalid request body. Please check your JSON format.
unauthorized: Unauthorized access. Please log in again.
google_insert_failed: Failed to create Google Calendar event.
google_update_failed: Failed to update Google Calendar event.
google_delete_failed: Failed to delete Google Calendar event.
gmail_account_internal_error: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.
gmail_account_invalid_request: Your request could not be processed. Please check your input and try again.
gmail_account_validation_failed: Some fields are invalid. Please review your input and try again.
gmail_account_auth_failed: Failed to connect with Google. Please reauthorize your Gmail account.
gmail_account_token_expired: Your Gmail session has expired. Please reconnect your account.
gmail_account_permission_denied: You don’t have permission to access this Gmail account.
gmail_account_not_found: The Gmail account you’re trying to access was not found.
gmail_account_already_linked: This Gmail account is already linked to another department.
gmail_account_create_failed: Unable to link your Gmail account. Please try again.
gmail_account_update_failed: Failed to update your Gmail account.
gmail_account_delete_failed: Failed to remove this Gmail account.
gmail_account_fetch_failed: Unable to fetch Gmail account information.
gmail_account_read_failed: Unable to open this email thread.
gmail_account_thread_not_found: The selected email conversation could not be found.
gmail_template_validation_failed: Invalid input. Please check the fields and try again.
invalid_link_format: Google file link format is invalid.
link_not_accessible: Google file link is not accessible or not public.
ads_log_detail_create_failed: Failed to create ads log detail.
ads_event_log_create_failed: Failed to create ads event log.
